title.narrative: CED Contribution to the Advocacy Fund

description.narrative: This activity ( CED Contribution to the Advocacy Fund) is a component of Climate and Development Knowledge Network reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £14,442,039. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Environmental policy and administrative management. , with the following implementing partners: PwC. The start date is 21-12-2009 and the end date is 30-09-2017.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Environment - Water, Natural Resource Management and Environment - Environment - policy, planning and administration
Aggregated spend of less than £500 - Financial Year 2013 Quarter 2
